Когда я её запустил в первый раз то был поражен не столько графикой  как физикой где привычные с виду статичные объекты в других играх того времени вёдер с красками имели собственный вес и поведение при ваздействии на них. А грави пушка это вообще шедевр , когда она мне попала в первый раз в руки я только с нейй и проходил игру швыряя во враго всё что только мог ею притянуть.

Второе прохождение игры- это всегда хорошо. Можно написать более точный обзор. Если вы любитель шутеров и экшена, я думаю игра вам будет по душе. Хочу заметить, что над игрой хорошо поработали дизайнеры уровней. Первая половина игры удивляет строением своих локаций. Они просто интересные и приятно играющиеся. Момент с водным скутером (по крайней мере я так его называю) просто не даёт скучать ни минуты . А после любого прыжка через препятствие начинаешь в диких воплях кричать "вауу это так зрелищно, хочу ещё!". Любителей сюжета ждёт годная научная-фантастическая постапокалиптическая тема. Сюжетные эпизоды хорошо вплетены в геймплейную составляющую. Что ещё надо для счастья. Но! На 60%-90% игра перестаёт удивлять и то изящество и великолепие, затмевается уныленькими пострелушками в Нова Проспект и Сити 17. Откровенно говоря это самая слабая часть игры. Здесь нету многократного "вау", зубодробительные экшена и сюжетом плоховато пропитано. И вот такую "штуку" добавить под конец игры? Чтобы все приятные эмоции закрасились чем-то невнятным? Но тем не менее игра по-своему прекрасна, до сих пор выглядит прилично, а как шутер играется не хуже Колды, а первая половина игры на 3 головы выше. К тому же не стоит забывать Эпизоды)

Ahhhhhhhh que delicia de jogo,eu amei esse jogo e tambem ate acho que pode ser o melhor jogo que eu ja joguei na minha vida.
A historia do jogo se passa 20 anos apos os eventos do primeiro jogo aonde seu personagem principal (Gordon freeman que tambem foi personagem prinicipal de half life 1) acorda no tempo pelo o G-man dando pouca informação do que aconteceu então freeman descobre que o planeta terra foi dominada por um imperio chamado os combine que escravidou o mundo inteiro menos um adividuo que virou o "imperador deles" O doutor Breen (Ele era o administrador da black mesa no Half life 1) então seu personagem junta a uma rebelião e encontra velhos amigos e parceiros de half life 1

Heard a lot about how good this game should be, so i bought it expecting an awsome game. And then i played it and quickly godt disapointed. This game should be great, but instead i just godt bored by it. And it dosn't help that most of the time it's just LOOK AT THE PHYSICS the game. The gameplay is just your generic run-of-the-mill FPS. But while FPS games is my favorite game genre, there still where somthing less intresting about this game. 
You can move around duing cut-scenes  simpley to hide the fact that the game is filled with UNSKIPABLE CUT-SCENES. The weapons is not that intresting either, and you will find all the weapons to quickley in the game, making exploring the levels for secrets less intresting, the crowbar is okay i guess, as well as the magnum and the shotgun, but the standard pistol has a series lags power, and it sounds more like someone clapping there hands together rather than a gun, the pulse rifle has a tiny magasine for what essentially is an assault rifle, quickly making it pretty pointless, the crossbow has no real reason to bi in the game, it's only use is the fact that it is the only weapon that has a scope, but it's short magnification dosn't make it usefull at all, and although the rocket launcher is pretty strong, it can't hold that many rockets, which isn't that bad except most of the enemies that has to be taken down by explosive weapons, can take a ridiculous amound of damage, so your constantley running out of rockets and have to replenish your rockets, which woundn't be so anoying if those enemies didn't take so mucth damage to beat. Snipers can also only be killed by explosives. the only fun part of the game at least for me, was the gravity gun, but it also losses it's apeal later in the game when you are attacked by a horde of enemies and need to take them down quickley. When you kill a combine they make an awful noice that quickly godt on my nerves. All in all, i don't see the apeal of this game, neither do i see why it has such a high praise, i instead found an mediocre shooter witch some mehhh graphics, cringeworthy humor and dialog, and an uninteresting main protagonist and an forgetable story. This game is a GIANT DISAPPOINTMENT that dosn't deserves all the praise it's gotten over the years. It's in my opinion: THE MOST DISAPPONING GAME OF ALL TIME. If you want to play an FPS from the same year that still holds op to this day, play Unreal Tournament 2004.

根本不必过多的介绍，实实在在的经典。FPS fan或者科幻迷是必须要玩的！

Lo había jugado muchas veces antes pirata y me he hecho con él en el 2017 a trece años de su salida original. 

Debo decir que si bien la historia de Half Life requiere de atención a los detalles y la formulación propia de teorías para tratar de encontrarle un sentido, no implica que no sea una de las mejores historias de videojuegosq que haya visto. Siendo pragmáticos, si bien sus personajes son distintivos y se ganan tu simpatía -lo digo habiendo jugado títulos ya actuales-, pues casi todo el peso de los mismos recae sobre la nostalgia que nos genera este juego.

Sigue siendo un shooter muy entretenido con escenarios excelentemente cuidados para su época, con una mecánica FPS simple pero fluida en todo momento, con una rejugabilidad basada meramente en logros, pero que bien no te deja llevar a cabo la misma acción durante más de veinte minutos seguidos porque en si el ritmo del juego cambia concorde las situaciones que nos encontremos al avanzar en la historia, lo que lo vuelve sumamente entretenido por más lineal que sea.

En el apartado sonoro los sonidos de las armas están bastante bien, no te dan la sensación de disparar pistolas de juguete como en muchos otros juegos, y la calidad de los mismos es alta igualmente. El apartado ambiental está muy bien de igual forma y bastante cuidado. Las actuaciones de voz de los personajes bien logradas.


Probablemente me salté un par de cosas pero, en conclusión es uno de mis FPS favoritos de todos los tiempos. Habiéndolo saboreado minuciosamente en el tardío 2017 me es difícil no compararlo o tratar de llevarlo a la par de otros títulos similares, pero tomando en cuenta el impacto que tuvo en su salida, le otorgo un 10/10.

PD: Esos 7,49$ lo valen.

Oh, the Half-Life 2. Probably shaped video game scene just like it's ancestor from far back 1998. When game from 2004 graphics still kinda hold up 'till this day, you know you're in for a treat. It's still fun to bash headcrabs with crowbar, still fun to gravity gun saw onto zombies, still fun to command armies of antlions. I would recommend to play on "hard" difficulty for max experience with this game, as even then game wasn't that hard. I did die few times, mostly due to getting surprised by hordes or grenades. Considering that this game is 10Eur on store and on sales goes as low as just 0.99Eur, there really isn't any reason to not get this game. After all, it got highest rating on "Metacritic" PC games for a reason

Okay, here's an nostalgia-free, genuine review about this game.
It was made in 2000..ish...whatever

+Cool Story, long chapters, great physics based puzzles
-Many of these characters you would only meet once or twice (Like in the first game
+Lots of Variety in between chapters
+Great weapon design
-Faulty Ally AI: They would often keep getting in your way, since collision is enabled for them
+Good Voice Acting
+Great Soundtrack
-Dissapointing Ending (Then we have HL2 Episode 1 and 2)
+Quite a few achievements for adding replayability
+An atmospheric intro
+Mods :3
+/-Hard Mode (Its a +/- For the fact while it certainly brings a bit of challenge to the game, it gets very annoying. Like some enemies always one shotting you *COUGH* striders *COUGH* And, like using 7 rockets to take down gunships)
+Decent Controls
+Good Physics for its Time
-Background Audio (being bugged out with silence much of the time)
-Glitches with Physics (Then again, its an outdated engine)
+An amazing price for what it was (about $25 for the Orange Box: Including the entire HL2 Series, The Original Portal, Team Fortress 2, The Lost Coast, And HL2 and HL1 Deathmatch. Money well spent, I'd say)
-There isn't a part 3 (RIP Mark Laidlaw's hopes and dreams)

At the most, if its your 1st time playing, this game will give you... about 12-16 hours.
I hope this helps some buyers looking for some games in their library :3
I'd give it a solid 8/10. Its certainly a classic
